code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Checkout(_ref){let{clearCart}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const[address,setAddress]=useState("");const[success,setSuccess]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCheckout=e=>{e.preventDefault();clearCart();setSuccess(true);setTimeout(()=>navigate("/"),2000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Checkout"}),success?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83C\uDF89 Order placed successfully!"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleCheckout,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Full Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Delivery Address",value:address,onChange:e=>setAddress(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Place Order"})]})]});}export default Checkout;
